articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il from Italian Figure 
    Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift by Giancarlo Elia Valori, director of the Italian Institute of International Relations.
 The gift was conveyed to the DPRK ambassador to China by the director on Jan. 17.    
 The director extended warm congratulations to Kim Jong Il on his birthday and wholeheartedly wished him good health and great success in the work to accomplish his noble cause.

articles.content:
River-crossing Exercise to Be Staged in S. Korea 
    Pyongyang, January 20 (KCNA) -- A south Korean army corps announced that it would launch a large-scale river-crossing exercise in the River Hanthan in Ryonchon County, Kyonggi Province, from January 20 to 26, according to south Korean MBC.
 It was reported that the exercise is aimed to increase the capacity to overcome river obstacles in winter and carry out a mobile warfare.    
 The military exercises staged by the south Korean military bellicose forces one after another from the beginning of the new year are challenging the desire of the fellow countrymen to defend peace and security in the Korean Peninsula and laying difficulties in the way of achieving cooperation for peace against war.
